actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act with respect to Government contracts and small business concerns.

summary.text: Requires certification as to responsibility and capability to perform Government contracts by small business concerns to Government procurement officers or officers engaged in the sale or disposition of Federal property in order to qualify as Government contracts under the Small Business Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act with respect to Government contracts and small business concerns.
